translation.title: Fullstack Developer
translation.subtitle: Hello! I am a Fullstack Developer with a passion for creating innovative and efficient solutions. With experience in various technologies, I am constantly seeking new challenges and opportunities to turn ideas into reality.

skills.title: Skills
skills.subtitle: The skills and technologies I have learned and perfected while studying programming

projects.title: Main Projects
projects.subtitle: Personal projects developed professionally, following best practices and clean code.

cordiumjs.description: A library written in TypeScript for communication with Discord servers, created with a focus on performance. This library supports Multicore (multiple CPU cores).

restman.description: A project that recreates the Postman website for educational purposes. This site aims to implement the main function of Postman.

dentist.title: Websites for Dentists
dentist.description: A simple website that simulates a landing page for a dental clinic, created using NextJS, TailwindCSS, and Shadcn/UI.
